title: Confused with my download lol
body: So I decided to reinstall league because i've had problems before. I cant download 15000 mbs because everyone is on almost all day including night time. I got it down to 6000 mbs left. I closed the client to play another game and when I return it starts up and says 6000 mbs left. but after a couple seconds it says installing and then goes back to 15000 mbs?

replies.body: That is kinda weird that it showed the old download progress at first, that must have been some weird visual error. Our patcher, unfortunately, doesn't have a pause feature, so you'll have to finish up the download in one pass.
